```{r}
library(bohemia)
```

```{r}
source('../rpackage/bohemia/R/generate_data_dictionary.R')
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)
library(stringr)
data_dict <- generate_data_dictionary(path = '../forms/census/census.xls',
                                      language = 'Swahili', 
                                      include_variable_names = FALSE, 
                                      include_relevant = FALSE, 
                                      shorten_many = 15, 
                                      choice_names_too = FALSE)
```
